	# HOUSE OF BALLIOL (Pretender Kings of Scotland)

	# Grandfather of the Pretender to Scotland
	sco_john_balliol_of_durham = {
		first_name = { name = name_john }
		nickname = { name = nick_the_elder }
		culture = northumbrian
		religion = catholic
		estate = nobles_estate
		adm = 69 dip = 28 mil = 26
		birth_date = 1205.1.1

		first_name = { name = name_henry }
		nickname = { name = the_long }
		culture = champenais
		religion = catholic
		estate = nobles_estate
		adm = 78 dip = 85 mil = 64
		birth_date = 1127.12.1
		death_date = 1181.3.16
		birth = vitry_en_pertois
		father = chp_thibault_ii_blois

		mother = rim_constanza_ondedei

		child_trait = child_rowdy
	}
